27#ifndef __XEN_PUBLIC_IO_CONSOLE_H__
28#define __XEN_PUBLIC_IO_CONSOLE_H__
29
30typedef uint32_t XENCONS_RING_IDX;
31
32#define MASK_XENCONS_IDX(idx, ring) ((idx) & (sizeof(ring)-1))
33
34struct xencons_interface {
35 char in[1024];
36 char out[2048];
37 XENCONS_RING_IDX in_cons, in_prod;
38 XENCONS_RING_IDX out_cons, out_prod;
39};
40
41#ifdef XEN_WANT_FLEX_CONSOLE_RING
42#include "ring.h"
43DEFINE_XEN_FLEX_RING(xencons);
44#endif
45
46#endif /* __XEN_PUBLIC_IO_CONSOLE_H__ */
47
